patthana18.28:1.1: Saraṇaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.28:2.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
